articles.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney is appointing a global investment banker and pension fund manager to be Canada’s next ambassador in Washington. articles.title: Barry Manilow has early-stage lung cancer and will undergo surgery
articles.description: Barry Manilow will be having surgery to remove a cancerous spot on his lung and will reschedule his January concerts, the singer announced Monday.
